Description.Name: Piloting
Description.Details: Piloting increase Melee hit chance and base Sprint distance. It also improves the threshold of stability that triggers INSTEADY.

temporalSetResult: [[RES_MW,{RES_MW.Callsign}]] has [[DM.SimGameStatDescDefs[SimGameStatDesc_Piloting], Piloting]] set to {RES_VALUE.ToString} for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
temporalPositiveResult: [[RES_MW,{RES_MW.Callsign}]] has [[DM.SimGameStatDescDefs[SimGameStatDesc_Piloting], Piloting]] increased by {RES_VALUE.ToString} for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
temporalNegativeResult: [[RES_MW,{RES_MW.Callsign}]] has [[DM.SimGameStatDescDefs[SimGameStatDesc_Piloting], Piloting]] decreased by {RES_VALUE.ToString} for {RES_DURATION.ToString} days
